subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The Chelsea captain Terry lifted the League Cup after a 2-0 victory over Tottenham on Sunday at Wembley Stadium in London, almost two years after Chelsea collected its last prize.
snippet: The Chelsea captain Terry lifted the League Cup after a 2-0 victory over Tottenham on Sunday at Wembley Stadium in London, almost two years after Chelsea collected its last prize.
